column1: It starts acting totally incorrect in the means of confusing 'adding' with 'removing' in matters of it calling its own tool for writing code, resulting in empty files due to that. I noticed that because suddenly the diffs were so weird before accepting, and when it created code from scratch, it showed all-red diffs and then empty files after accepted. Confirmed the bug when I confronted gpt4.1 about it and then it corrected itself. Struggle a lot talking to gpt4.1 due to behaving like a complete imbecil to be honest.

column1: 3247077403,"Claude Opus 4 responses disappear after scrolling in the chat, rendering its output useless","
1)  Ask Claude Opus 4 to perform a task
2)  After the task completes, scroll up in the chat window quite a bit
3)  Scroll  back down, all of the output / code examples from Opus are now gone from view
